products.name: Pomegranate

Ideal for retail, export, and bulk supply to food industries worldwide, our pomegranates meet global quality and hygiene standards.

products.name: Organic Pulses

items.name: Organic Brown Chickpeas (Kala Chana)

items.description: Organic Brown Chana, also known as Kala Chana, is packed with fiber, iron, and protein. Grown organically without synthetic inputs, it supports a balanced diet and sustainable agriculture.

items.shortDesc: Easily digestible split yellow moong dal.
items.description: Our Organic Moong Dal Yellow Split is a rich source of plant-based protein and essential nutrients. Cultivated on certified organic farms, it is perfect for making wholesome soups and dals.

items.name: Organic Arhar Dal (Toor Dal)

items.description: Our Organic Arhar Dal, also known as Toor Dal, is a staple in Indian cuisine. Rich in protein and dietary fiber, it is cultivated on certified organic farms, ensuring purity and superior taste.

items.shortDesc: Protein-rich yellow chana dal for nutritious meals.
items.description: Our Organic Yellow Chana Dal is a split version of brown chickpeas, rich in protein and dietary fiber. Grown on certified organic farms, it is perfect for making wholesome dals and curries.

items.shortDesc: Nutrient-dense black urad dal for traditional recipes.
items.description: Our Organic Black Urad Dal is a staple in Indian cuisine, known for its rich protein and fiber content. Cultivated without synthetic inputs, it is ideal for making dals, idlis, and dosas.

items.description: Our Organic Malka Masoor Dal, or Red Lentils, is a quick-cooking pulse rich in protein and essential nutrients. Grown on certified organic farms, it is perfect for making wholesome soups and dals.

Free from synthetic additives, our products are ideal for cooking, baking, beverages, and health applications.

items.name: Organic Jaggery Powder
items.shortDesc: Premium organic jaggery powder.
items.description: Our Organic Jaggery Powder is made from the concentrated juice of organically grown sugarcane or palm, ensuring a rich, caramel-like flavor and superior nutritional profile. This natural sweetener is ideal for cooking, baking, and traditional desserts.

items.name: Organic Raw Sugar
items.shortDesc: Premium organic raw sugar.
items.description: Our Organic Raw Honey is harvested from the nectar of flowers collected by bees on certified organic farms. This unprocessed honey retains its natural enzymes, antioxidants, and health benefits, making it a perfect addition to beverages, desserts, and wellness routines.

items.name: Organic Dhaga Mishri – Organic Sugar Threads
items.shortDesc: Premium organic sugar threads (mishri).
items.description: Our Organic Dhaga Mishri is made from the concentrated juice of organically grown sugarcane, formed into delicate threads. This natural sweetener is ideal for traditional uses, cooking, and as a wholesome treat.

items.name: Organic Multiflora Forest Honey – Organic Honey

items.name: Organic Coconut Sugar Powder – Organic Coconut Sugar
